Notes: A gravity area that revolves around a barrel-shaped planet.

Obj_arg0.Name: Useless
Obj_arg0.Description: Read but never used for anything. Default is 500.

SW_A.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
